column1:
Thank you for registering to be a part of this study. Your task is to evaluate the accuracy of tables that attempt to replicate an image of a given original table by 
(i) making observations on such copies, followed by 
(ii) editing these copies to exactly match the structure of the original table
You will perform this task for 6 copies.

None of the copies contain Excel formulas or presentation features such as names, borders, themes, or  conditional formatting, so please do not consider these as factors for your evaluation or add any of these features while editing the copies. All tables pertain to financial data.
